name: Cottage Crusher
description:
Are  you looking for some not so intense multiplayer action? This is the game for you! Build your village, then build a monster to wreak havoc on your opponents village.

Featuring
  •  Freshly composed music
  • Highly customization game settings (do your own balancing!)
  • Relative amusement for up to and including two players
  • Humane kaiju defence option
  • Realistic goose temperament
  • Law abiding monsters
  • Conspiracy theorists
  • Innovative head wear
  • Not so innovative hand wear
Controls

Player 1

  • WASD to move
  • Q to select

Player 2

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Enter to select
Reviews
  • "...I think I broke it" - Our only play tester

Fonts: TinyUnicode by DuffsDevice, and SullyVerge by McGraw
